product.description: Jil Sander's sophisticated minimalism is characterized by neutral tones, clean lines, and precisely-placed details. Crafted from smooth leather, these Chelsea boots are shaped to a round-toe silhouette with tonal rubber soles and elasticated gussets.

Known for its streamlined modernity, Giorgio Armani presents an elegant take on classic silhouettes and immaculate suiting. Round off your look with these Oxford shoes, made in Italy from patent leather.
Tricolor grosgrain trims add a preppy touch to Thom Browne’s Americana-led designs. These calfskin low-top sneakers have signature pull tabs and matching stripes on the rubber midsoles.
Team your cold-weather looks with the Delsa Suede Chelsea boot from Manolo Blahnik. The Italian-crafted pair is made from smooth suede and will look good paired with chinos, jeans, and pants.
Inspired by outdoor styles, these ankle boots from Giorgio Armani are made from supple leather with lace-up fronts. They feature branded tongues and rest atop chunky soles for optimum comfort.

A historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, GG Supreme canvas is a key fabric at the house of Gucci. These high-top sneakers are inspired by tennis, featuring lugged rubber soles with logo midsoles.

These Chelsea boots from Valentino Garavani are a timeless addition to your edit. Made in Italy from smooth leather, the classic design features heel tabs subtly decorated with brand-signature rockstuds and elasticated sides.

These loafers from Valentino Garavani are classics for a reason. Crafted from smooth black leather with round toes, this pair is suited to formalwear and office attire alike. Note the tonal Rockstud embellishing the heels.
The Louis high-top sneakers from Christian Louboutin are made from smooth navy blue suede. The design is inspired by '80s styles and has tonal grosgrain trims and discreet topstitching.

Christian Louboutin’s Happyrui sneakers are a low-top design inspired by classic tennis shoes. The modern style combines leather and suede panels with tactile monogrammed fabric and sits atop thick rubber soles.
Add to your sneaker collection with the essential DDB0 pair from Lanvin. They’re made from white leather atop durable rubber soles.
Step into The Row’s effortless minimalism with the Owen Runner sneakers. This style is made in Italy from technical mesh and features leather panels, tonal laces, and sporty lugged soles.

A historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, GG Supreme canvas is a key fabric at the house of Gucci. These slip-on loafers continue to favor the bold with Horsebit detailing and Web Stripes.

Sicilian culture is at the heart of Dolce&Gabbana's aesthetic, which attributes most of its bold styles to its Italian heritage. Elevate your edit with these slides crafted from leather and embossed with the brand's logo.

Achieve effortless elegance in the Otawi slides from Manolo Blahnik. Designed with cross-over straps, this pair is made in Italy from smooth black leather and has a cushioned leather insole for added comfort.

Now a house signature, the Burberry Check pattern was originally used as trench coat lining in the 1920s. The pattern animates these felted penny loafers, adding a heritage flair to a classic shoe style.
The Louis Junior sneakers from Christian Louboutin feature small spikes on the toe box. The design is made from smooth suede and comes with the brand's signature red soles.

These low-top sneakers exemplify Maison Margiela's deconstructive essence. Boasting a paneled construction, the multicolored patterned canvas uppers are contrasted by black calfskin, white rubber soles and matching toe caps, and branded suede heel counters.
Look to Dolce&Gabbana for luxury essentials in a modern man's wardrobe. Made from smooth leather, these loafers are enhanced with silver-toned logo hardware for instant recognition.

Named for the mountains that inspired their design, the Alpinosol ankle boots are made from smooth brown suede. Finished with Christian Louboutin's iconic red soles, this pair makes every step you take a sophisticated one.
Crafted from smooth leather in a rounded silhouette, the Le Loafer penny loafers from Saint Laurent feature the label's Cassandre logo. The slip-on design rests atop leather soles.

The Rockrunner sneakers from Valentino Garavani are made with fabric uppers that feature suede trims. This style is made in a classic round-toe silhouette with a lace-up design and set atop rubber soles.

Valentino Garavani looked to ancient architecture to create the now-iconic Rockstud embellishments. These black calfskin Oxford shoes have embellished welts and exaggerated square toes that create a modern silhouette, offset by traditional lace-up vamps.
Made in Italy from supple suede in brown, these Tod's Derby shoes feature a classic lace-up design with signature rubber pebbles at the soles.

The VLogo Pace sneakers from Valentino Garavani make for a vibrant addition to your footwear edit. Crafted from mesh with leather trims, the sporty design features the brand-signature VLogo detail and is set atop dented rubber soles.

The mountain-inspired Alpinosol Chelsea boots are Italian-crafted from soft suede with elasticated side gussets, pull tabs, and chunky, lugged rubber soles. Finished with Christian Louboutin's iconic red soles, this pair makes every step you take a sophisticated one.

The Totaloop sneakers from Valentino Garavani are made from brand-signature Toile Iconographe material with tonal leather trims. This classic pair is set atop chunky rubber soles and features a logo print on the tongue.
Made from leather, these white tennis sneakers from Brunello Cucinelli feature thick rubber soles and are finished with brand-iconic logo detailing at the suede-paneled heel counters and tongues.

Established with the aim to create the world’s finest fabrics, Zegna is now the go-to brand for luxurious and innovative menswear. The Siena Flex Derby shoes are crafted from hand-buffed leather with memory foam for added support and comfort.
Crafted from leather in Italy, these brogues from Gucci combine traditional broguing with intricate elements. Half Horsebit detailing across the bridges creates a memorable and label-defining finish.

Tom Ford's meticulous approach to formal aesthetics appears with sophisticated reverence for the Bailey loafers. This glossy black patent leather style has beveled square toes that contrast the traditional elements, such as penny straps.
This season, Saint Laurent presents its take on Californian cool with the LAX sneakers. Made from white leather with a washed effect that's done by hand, each mid-top pair is unique.

Build your casualwear looks around these 3XL sneakers from Balenciaga. Crafted from lightweight white mesh, they have distressed red and blue details for a lived-in look and are set on rubber soles with oversized heels.
Invest in these loafers from Gucci for a timeless design that transcends seasons. Made from black leather, the style is finished with silver-toned chain Interlocking G hardware on the front.

The 3XL sneakers from Balenciaga are a stand-out silhouette with logo-embossed details. They are made from mesh and faux leather with a worn-in effect and feature chunky rubber soles for a lengthened look.
In a sleek white silhouette, these minimal sneakers from Christian Louboutin are Italian-made from smooth leather.

The 3XL sneakers from Balenciaga are a stand-out silhouette with logo-embossed details. They are made from mesh and faux leather with a worn-in effect and feature chunky rubber soles for a lengthened look.
The Curb sneakers from Lanvin are made from suede in a round-toe silhouette. The Italian-made design feature chunky laces sporting a zig-zag pattern and are set atop rubber soles.
Balenciaga's Runner sneakers are made from panels of mesh and technical nylon. Featuring squared toes, they have logo embroidery on the tongues.

Defined by their chunky, lugged soles, the Davisol Derby shoes from Christian Louboutin combine elegance with a casual aesthetic. Expertly crafted from plush black suede, the squared-toe style is finished with distinctive red detailing.

Brand-iconic motifs combined, the Astroloubi sneakers from Christian Louboutin feature signature Loubispikes at the heels, monogram detailing at the outsoles, and Loubi-red detailing. They’re made from smooth leather with chunky rubber soles.

Christian Louboutin's Louis Junior Spikes sneakers are Italian-made with blue suede uppers and feature spiked embellishments on the rounded toe. The lace-up style has a low-top silhouette and is set atop a rubber sole.

Take your footwear edit in the right direction with these ankle boots from Gucci. Expertly crafted in Italy from GG Supreme canvas, they feature comfortable stacked heels and discrete logo lettering for iconic recognition.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. This classic flair is showcased on designs such as these Derby shoes, made from dark brown suede for versatile styling options.

Perfect for daily strolls and outdoor activities, the Larue Chelsea boots from Moncler will be your go-to choice for both style and functionality. Made from supple leather, this pair features chunky soles and a slip-on silhouette.

Command the street with your impeccable style and these leather knee-high boots from Rick Owens. Set on chunky lugged rubber soles, the pair has curved inside zips and snap button trims for adjustments.

The M-Way Chelsea boots from Valentino Garavani are a timeless addition to your edit. Made in Italy from smooth leather, the classic design features midsoles decorated with brand-signature Rockstuds and elasticated sides.
The Varsiboat boat shoes from Christian Louboutin are made from suede for a tactile handle. Set on flat rubber soles, they have debossed detailing at the vamps and rounded toes.

These SL/61 sneakers from Saint Laurent have a classic low-top silhouette. Made from leather, they have perforations to ensure breathability, lace-up fronts, and contrasting panels for a basketball-inspired finish.
Every shoe from Manolo Blahnik starts as a sketch by the designer himself. Made from brown suede, the Monaco loafers are a minimalist’s dream with their sleek silhouette and contrasting white soles.
Elegant yet practical, these slim and narrow loafers from Christian Louboutin are crafted in Italy from smooth black leather, in a classic slip-on design.
Since its conception in 1961, Saint Laurent has been coveted for its elegant Parisian aesthetic. This extends to their footwear, such as these sporty-chic white leather sneakers.
Dolce&Gabbana's favorite symbols adorn the Daymaster sneakers. Made from leather, this pair is set on chunky soles and will be a comfortable addition to your athleisure wardrobe.

Crafted from materials of the highest quality, Gianvito Rossi’s designs are handmade using both traditional craftsmanship and innovative techniques. These patent leather loafers have a classic slip-on shape and flat stacked heels.

Conquer the city's streets with these ankle boots from Bottega Veneta. They're made from supple calf leather to a square-toe silhouette, featuring functional side zippers and rubber-injected outsoles for optimum grip.
Complete your look on a sharp note with these Derby shoes from Dolce&Gabbana. The timeless style is made from patent brushed leather with grosgrain trims.

Formal occasions demand outstanding footwear, like these glossy Derby shoes from Bottega Veneta. Meticulously crafted from black calfskin using the house's Intrecciato technique, they feature polished lace-up fronts and leather soles.
Saint Laurent adds label-signature Western accents to the classic Wyatt ankle boots. Made from velvety suede, the pair rest atop block heels and boast rounded toes and stitched paneling.
These Italian-made sneakers from Dolce&Gabbana are instantly recognizable. Made from leather, they have a worn effect and feature the brand's lettering on the heel.

Every shoe from Manolo Blahnik starts as a sketch by the designer himself. Made from brown suede, the Brompton Chelsea boots are designed with a classic silhouette and lug soles designed to slot perfectly into your collection.

Tricolor grosgrain trims add a preppy touch to Thom Browne’s Americana-led designs. The motif decorates the pull tabs of the Tech Runner sneakers, complete with virgin wool uppers and athletic-inspired transparent cushioned soles.
In a white colorway, these Dolce&Gabbana sneakers are Italian-made from leather, have a low-top silhouette, and feature the label's logo in black at the tongue and soles.

Add Vassili 60 ankle boots from Saint Laurent to your footwear collection. Expertly crafted in Italy from polished leather, they feature almond toes, flared heels and convenient side zipper fastenings, ensuring timeless style.

Each Brunello Cucinelli design is handmade in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These Chelsea boots are crafted from refined suede with rubber soles and elasticated sides.
Add refined designs to your footwear rotation, cue these Chelsea boots from Tod's. Crafted from suede, the brown style features elasticated sides and brand-signature pebble detailing at the heels.

Tom Ford creates sophisticated styles that will become a core part of your edit. Made of brown suede calfskin, these Chelsea boots have traditional elements, such as pull tabs, elasticated side panels, and stacked heels.

The latest addition to Gucci's line of retro sneakers is the MAC80. Made in Italy from leather, this pair has ribbed inserts and Interlocking G embroidery that references the house's founder Guccio Gucci.

Brunello Cucinelli's designs are created in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These brown suede loafers are finished with tassels on the front and set atop a rubber sole.
These loafers from Tod are a slip-on style for easy on-the-go wear. They’re made in Italy from beige-toned suede and sit atop comfortable rubber lug soles.
With an almond-shaped toe, these classic Oxford shoes from Zegna are Italian-crafted from supple leather. The design features a formal lace-up detail and is finished with sleek rubber soles.

Finish off your casual ensembles with the Tread Slick ankle boots from Alexander McQueen. Crafted from smooth leather, this pair features chunky rubber soles and is defined by silver-toned zipper fastening at the center.

Crafted from smooth nappa leather, the Toy slippers are a sophisticated choice with seamless construction and a squared-toe silhouette. All of Loewe's leather goods are handcrafted in Spain, reflecting the house's centuries-long expertise and artisanal methods.
The Gucci Run sneakers are a streamlined version of traditional running styles. Made from plush suede with mesh inserts and GG embroidery, the design is set on bi-chromatic soles.

Designed to transcend seasons and trends, Lemaire's styles strike the perfect balance between quality and functionality. These Derby shoes are crafted from polished black leather and rest on stacked heels.
Turn to these penny loafers from Giorgio Armani for a timeless addition to your everyday wardrobe. The style is crafted from black leather and set atop a thick rubber sole for comfort.

A true classic, these loafers from Gucci feature the label's iconic golden Horsebit detail over the bridges. The slip-on pair is made in Italy from supple leather and features tonal stitching throughout.
Giorgio Armani elevates these Derby shoes with a distinct platform rubber sole. Made in Italy from black leather, the lace-up style has a rounded toe and logo lettering on the tongue.

Arriving in a classic silhouette, these loafers from Dolce&Gabbana will make a refined addition to your edit. Expertly crafted from plush suede, the style rests on quilted footbeds and is adorned with gleaming golden hardware.

The Happyrui low-top sneakers from Christian Louboutin are inspired by classic tennis shoes. Set atop thick rubber soles, they're crafted from a mix of off-white leather, suede, and nylon, and are finished with a heel tab.

Christian Louboutin’s Happyrui sneakers are a low-top design inspired by classic tennis shoes. The modern style combines leather and suede panels with tactile monogrammed fabric and sits atop thick rubber soles.

This update to Maison Margiela's iconic Replica sneakers sees the sleek silhouette in a white and grey shade with leather uppers, suede trims and debossed logo on the tongue, atop a brown rubber sole.

A historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, GG Supreme canvas is a key fabric at the house of Gucci. These sneakers are inspired by tennis, featuring lugged rubber soles with logo midsoles.
